
```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Organizing data

# All cell/sub types A include Fibroblasts
annot_df <- subset(annot_df, CD90 =='Yes')

grp <- 'A'
```



## Other Comparisons

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width = 7, fig.height = 7, warning=FALSE}
boxplots_m(annot_df, col_name = paste0('cell_type_', grp), cell_pop = 'Endothelial')
```

